alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 4:40AM AKST until February 18 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of around 4 inches. * WHERE...The Northeast Gulf Coast including Yakutat. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel will be difficult. Snow will be wet and difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulations of up to 1 inch per hour are possible. The heaviest snow rates will occur early this morning, after which a transition to all rain begins through mid-day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
